The stirring narrative of the faith that led a persecuted people to Missouri and beyond is one of the most poignant untold tale of American history . It is the account of a valiant struggle to exercise the right promised by a fledgling nation . `` The Work and the Glory : American Zion '' unearths the story of the passion behind the movement which eventually launched the largest American migration and the colonization of the West : the vision of a promised land in America .

SalterStreetFilmsInternational UnitedBroadcastingInc . UnitedStatesofAmerica MichaelMooreWhy do 11,000 people die in America each year at the hand of gun violence ? Talking head yelling from every TV camera blame everything from Satan to video game . But are we that much different from many other country ? What set u apart ? How have we become both the master and victim of such enormous amount of violence ? This is not a film about gun control . It is a film about the fearful heart and soul of the United States , and the 280 million Americans lucky enough to have the right to a constitutionally protected Uzi . From a look at the Columbine High School security camera tape to the home of Oscar-winning NRA President Charlton Heston , from a young man who make homemade napalm with The Anarchist 's Cookbook to the murder of a six-year-old girl by another six-year-old , Bowling for Columbine is a journey through America , through our past , hoping to discover why our pursuit of happiness is so riddled with violence .

title: 2016: Obama's America
tags: Documentary UnitedStatesofAmerica JohnSullivan DineshD'Souza2016 : Obama 's America take audience on a gripping visual journey into the heart of the world most powerful office to reveal the struggle of whether one man 's past will redefine America over the next four year . The film examines the question , `` If Obama win a second term , where will we be in 2016 ? '' Across the globe and in America , people in 2008 hungered for a leader who would unite and lift u from economic turmoil and war . True to Americas ideal , they invested their hope in a new kind of president , Barack Obama . What they did n't know is that Obama is a man with a past , and in powerful way that past defines him -- who he is , how he think , and where he intends to take America and the world . title: Inside Deep Throat
tags: History Documentary DennisHopper usa 1970s sexualrevolution unsimulatedsex UnitedStatesofAmerica FentonBailey RandyBarbatoIn 1972 , a seemingly typical shoestring budget pornographic film wa made in a Florida hotel , `` Deep Throat , '' starring Linda Lovelace . This film would surpass the wildest expectation of everyone involved to become one of the most successful independent film of all time . It caught the public imagination which met the spirit of the time , even a the self appointed guardian of public morality struggled to suppress it , and created , for a brief moment , a possible future where sexuality in film had a bold artistic potential . This film cover the story of the making of this controversial film , it stunning success , it hysterical opposition along with it dark side of mob influence and allegation of the on set mistreatment of the film 's star . In short , the combined event would redefine the popular appeal of pornography , even a more cynical development would lead it down other path .

title: Slacker Uprising
tags: Documentary MichaelMoore presidentialelections UnitedStatesofAmerica MichaelMooreSlacker Uprising is a movie of Michael Moore 's tour of college in swing state during the 2004 election , with a goal to encourage 18–29 year old to vote , and the response it received . The film is a re-edited version of Captain Mike Across America , which played at the Toronto International Film Festival in 2007 . It is one of the first feature length film made by a known director to be released a a free and legal download online . The free download is only available to those residing in the United States and Canada . The film wa also made available free for online viewing and download on the Lycos Cinema platform a well a iTunes and blip.tv . It had a one-night-only run at the Michigan Theater , where Michael Moore spoke briefly . The film is available in DVD format . Slacker Uprising feature live performance or appearance by Eddie Vedder , Roseanne Barr , Joan Baez , Tom Morello , R.E.M. , Steve Earle , and Viggo Mortensen . The original score is by Anti-Flag .

title: Once in a Lifetime: The Extraordinary Story of the New York Cosmos
tags: Documentary Pelé newyork beckenbauer pele PaulCrowder JohnDowerIn the 1970s the North American Soccer League marked the first attempt to introduce soccer to American sport fan . While most team had only limited success at best , one managed to break through to genuine mainstream popularity - the New York Cosmos . The brainchild of Steve Ross ( Major executive at Warner Communications ) and the Ertegun brother ( Founders of Atlantic Records ) , the Cosmos got off to a rocky start in 1971 , but thing changed in 1975 when the world 's most celebrated soccer star , the Brazilian champion Pele , signed with the Cosmos for a five-million-dollar payday . With the arrival of Pele , the Cosmos became a hit and the player became the toast of the town , earning their own private table at Studio 54 . A number of other international soccer star were soon lured to the Cosmos , including Franz Beckenbauer , Rodney Marsh , and Carlos Alberto , but with the turn of the decade , the team began losing favor with fan and folded in 1985 .

title: Guiana 1838
tags: Drama AasheekaaBathija guyana 19thcentury Guyana UnitedStatesofAmerica RohitJagessarThe abolition of slavery in the British Caribbean in 1834 prompt Gillanders , Arbuthnot & amp ; Company in Calcutta , a part of the East India Company , to recruit Coolies from India to fill the resulting labor void . The company hire Sinha , a fierce small-timer to sell dream of El Dorado to the unsuspecting , impoverished Coolies who are signed to five-year contract a indentured servant . Upon the Coolies ' arrival in British Guiana in 1838 , the British planter promptly enslave them to ensure that the growth of sugar in the British West Indies will continue uninterrupted . John Scoble of the British and Foreign Anti Slavery Society arrives on the colony a year later to discover a new form of slavery ; this time on the back of Indians .

title: Rise of the Entrepreneur: The Search for a Better Way
tags: The world is changing faster than ever . Technology is accelerating , job security is declining and income inequality is increasing . People are overworked and underpaid . With less time and freedom , people are left wondering if there is a better way . Our changing economy ha led to the rise of the entrepreneur . The fastest , most dependable and controllable way to become wealthy is to own your own business . This documentary gather today 's best expert and thought leader to forever change how you view work and wealth . Featuring expert Jordan Adler , John Assaraf , Kody Bateman , Chris Brogan , Richard Bliss Brooke , Ali Brown , Les Brown , Jack Canfield , Harry S. title: I Want Your Money
tags: DocumentaryTwo version of the American dream now stand in sharp contrast . One view the money you earned a yours and best allocated by you ; the other belief that an elite in Washington know best how to allocate your wealth . One champion the traditional American dream , which ha played out million of time through generation of Americans , of improving one 's lot in life and even daring to dream and build big . The other hold that there is no end to the `` good '' the government can do by taking and spending other people ' money in an ever-burgeoning list of program . The documentary film I Want Your Money expose the high cost in lost freedom and in lost opportunity to support a Leviathan-like bureaucratic state .

title: Censored Voices
tags: History Documentary AmosOz womandirector kNowProductions Germany Israel MorLoushyThe 1967 'Six-Day ' war ended with Israel 's decisive victory ; conquering Jerusalem , Gaza , Sinai and the West Bank . It is a war portrayed , to this day , a a righteous undertaking - a radiant emblem of Jewish pride . One week after the war , a group of young kibbutznik , led by renowned author Amos Oz , recorded intimate conversation with soldier returning from the battlefield . The recording revealed an honest look at the moment Israel turned from David to Goliath . The Israeli army censored the recording , allowing the kibbutznik to publish only a fragment of the conversation . 'Censored Voices ' reveals the original recording for the first time .

title: Call + Response
tags: Documentary JustinDillonCall + Response is a first of it kind feature documentary film that reveals the world ’ s 27 million dirtiest secret : there are more slave today than ever before in human history . Call + Response go deep undercover where slavery is thriving from the child brothel of Cambodia to the slave brick kiln of rural India to reveal that in 2007 , Slave Traders made more money than Google , Nike and Starbucks combined . Luminaries on the issue and many other prominent political and cultural figure offer first hand account of this 21st century trade . Performances from Grammy-winning and critically acclaimed artist move this chilling information into inspiration for stopping it . Music is part of the movement against human slavery . Dr. Cornel West connects the music of the American slave field to the popular music we listen to today , and offer this connection a a rallying cry for the modern abolitionist movement currently brewing .

tags: Drama LouisBrooke Kenya JimChuchuCreated by the member of a Nairobi-based art collective — who have removed their name from the film for fear of reprisal — this anthology film that dramatizes true-life story from Kenya ’ s oppressed LGBTQ community is both a labour of love and a bold act of militancy .

title: Breaking Upwards
tags: Comedy Romance ZoeLister-Jones independentfilm UnitedStatesofAmerica DarylWein'Breaking Upwards ' explores a young , real-life New York couple who , four year in and battling codependency , decide to intricately strategize their own break up . Based on an actual experiment devised by director/actor Daryl Wein and actress Zoe Lister-Jones , the film loosely interprets a year in their life exploring alternative to monogamy , and the madness that ensues . An uncensored look at young love , lust , and the pang of codependency , 'Breaking Upwards ' follows it character a they navigate each others ' emotion across the city they love . It begs the question : is it ever possible to grow apart together ?

title: Cavite
tags: Foreign Thriller NeillDelaLlana IanGamazonAdam , a security guard , travel from California to the Philippines , his native land , for his father 's funeral . He arrives in Manila . As he wait , a phone ring in his backpack ; he answer it , and a male voice tell him that his mother and sister are captive and will be killed if Adam doe n't cooperate . Over the next hour , the voice sends Adam by bus , taxi , motorized tricycle , and on foot through an urban landscape of busy street , cramped apartment , a fetid squatter ' camp , a bank , a cockfighting arena , and a church . Adam 's conversation with the voice cover murder , Islam , jihad , rebellion in Mindanao , and his family . What is it Adam will be commanded to do ?
